name: Poong (Adil)
description:
Pong is one of the first computer games that ever created, this simple "tennis like" game features two paddles and a ball, the goal is to defeat your opponent by being the first one to gain10 point, a player gets a point once the opponent misses a ball.

Cloned

I made the clone of pong to learn the godot game engine, this game will be featured on my channel as the godot learning series episode 1. Sub my channel for more info!

Thanks!

Thanks for trying out this clone, its nothing fancy and just a basic clone made in 3 days in godot 3.5.
